item.title: Teaser
item.description: dr. Johannes Korbmacher   Course coordinator Mathematical philosopher jkorbmacher.org logicalmethods.ai logische.methoden@uu.nl Logic?! app.wooclap.com/LMFAI0 Rationale: Logic is about reasoning. Reasoning is intelligent behavior. Some puzzles app.wooclap.com/LMFAI0 Cards If 3 is blue or red, the rule doesn't fail. If 8 is not blue, the rule fails. If red is even, the rule fails. If blue is even or od, the rule doesn't fail. Marriage Two cases: 1. Ada is married, 2. Ada is unmarried.
